title: Shiki as the Lurking Legend
theory: Shiki the Golden Lion may be the 'lurking legend' that Eiichiro Oda mentioned would appear in the story. Given that Shiki is canon and escaped Impel Down 20+ years ago, he could still be alive and planning something significant. Some fans theorize he may have connections to Blackbeard (Teach) or could appear in the final saga.
author: Worstgen Forum Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains speculation about future story developments and connections to recent manga chapters

title: Shiki's Canon Status and Future Appearance
theory: While Strong World is non-canon, Shiki himself is a canon character who appeared in Chapter 0. The theory suggests that because Oda went out of his way to make Shiki canon (even creating Chapter 0 for the movie), he must have future plans for the character. However, with One Piece in its Final Saga and Shiki not appearing yet, many fans debate whether he'll ever return to the main story or remain a movie-exclusive antagonist.
author: One Piece Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses current manga status and whether Shiki will appear in the final saga

title: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi's Strategic Value
theory: Some fans theorize that Oda made the Fuwa Fuwa no Mi canon because its abilities could be crucial for a future storyline. The ability to levitate massive objects and create flying islands could play a role in the final war or in reaching locations like Laugh Tale. This theory suggests that even if Shiki doesn't return, someone else might acquire the fruit after his death.
author: One Piece Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Speculates about future uses of the Devil Fruit in the story

title: Shiki's Connection to Rocks Pirates
theory: Given that Shiki was revealed to be a former member of the Rocks Pirates (alongside Whitebeard, Big Mom, and Kaido), some fans theorize that his escape from Impel Down and subsequent disappearance may be connected to uncovering or protecting secrets from that era. The theory suggests he might have knowledge about the Void Century or the Will of D that he's been investigating.
author: One Piece Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Shiki's connection to the Rocks Pirates and potential story implications
